alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 15 at 6:19PM CDT until September 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River at Forgan 8N affecting Beaver County. For the Cimarron River...including Kenton 2NE, Forgan 8N...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cimarron River at Forgan 8N. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the Cimarron River in northern Beaver county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.7 feet this evening. - Action stage is 4.0 feet. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 900 AM CDT.
